list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Refactor todo management API queries.
Enhanced the `/get_todos` endpoint to accept an optional task status filter using FastAPI's `Query` parameter. Clarified the existing comments and improved the readability of API endpoints by removing redundant code.

task.summary: Default task
intitial project
API CRUD construct

Refactor app and enhance error handling
Rename `TODO_app` to `app` and replace error returns with HTTP exceptions for more proper error handling. Also, fix the bug in `create_user` by correctly assigning the user to the dictionary.

Add JWT token generation and validation
Introduces new functions `sigin` and `decode` for generating and validating JWT tokens using FastAPI and PyJWT. This update enhances authentication mechanisms by securely encoding payloads with a secret key.

Add user authentication endpoints to API
Implemented signup, signin, and auth test endpoints using FastAPI. Incorporated email registration and token-based authentication.

Add user authentication endpoints to API
Implemented signup, signin, and auth test endpoints using FastAPI. Incorporated email registration and token-based authentication.

Add todo repository, schema, and model files
Implemented core functionality for managing To-Do items including CRUD operations in `todo_repository.py`, defined data validation schemas in `todo_schema.py`, and established a data model in `todo_model.py`. This setup provides a complete backend structure for handling To-Do items with MongoDB.

Add user repository and collection modules
Introduce `user_repository.py` and `user_collection.py` for handling user authentication and data operations. This includes password hashing, JWT token management, and MongoDB interactions for registration and authentication.

Refactor user authentication endpoints
Replaced in-memory userlist with database-backed user management. Updated signup and signin to use new async user repository methods, ensuring better separation of concerns and scalability.

Add IntelliJ configuration updates
Introduced several new configurations for project management, including AutoImportSettings and RecentsManager components. Also added Git settings, VCS Manager configuration, and coverage data management. Updated .idea/misc.xml to include a new "Black" component along with project SDK details.

Remove FastAPI user management; add MongoDB connection.
Removed the complete `main.py` and `new_main.py` that handled user management with FastAPI. Introduced a new `mongo_connection.py` to establish a MongoDB connection using motor and dotenv.

Add User model with Pydantic validation
Creates UserCreate, UserLogin, and UserResponse classes in Users/user_model.py. These classes include Pydantic validation for user attributes such as name, email, password, and token. This sets up a structured way to handle user data through type validation.

Integrate MongoDB for user management and To-Do items
Replaced FastAPI-based user management with MongoDB integration. Added user authentication functions and To-Do item operations using MongoDB collections.

Update MongoDB connection and task management
Simplified the MongoDB connection initialization by removing the default URL and enabling invalid certificate allowance. Refactored task and user management functionalities to use new data models and added token-based authentication.

Rename authentication file and add JWT-based methods
Renamed the `athentification.py` to `user_authentification.py` for better clarity. Added JWT token generation, decoding, and user registration/authentication functions leveraging FastAPI and MongoDB.

Refactor MongoDB setup and task management
Simplified MongoDB connection initialization and refactored task/user management to use new data models. Updated authentication to token-based and reorganized file structure for better readability.

Add requirements file and minor formatting changes
Created req.txt to list project dependencies. Updated workspace.xml and formatted imports in API_connect.py for better readability. Minor whitespace adjustment in user_model.py.

Add new endpoints and models for Todos
Updated API endpoints to handle Todos CRUD operations, added new TodoModel and UpdateTODOModel classes, and updated user and todo collections for proper request handling and data storage.

Update Todos model and comments
Revised the Todos model to correct task status assignment and improved comment clarity. Adjusted examples to ensure accurate data representation in the todos model.
save project

Delete orphaned todos and user repository files
Removed outdated todo_repository.py, todo_schema.py, user_collection.py, and user_repository.py files. Updated mongo_connection.py to improve logging and error handling for MongoDB connections. Cleaned up API_connect.py to optimize user-specific todos and eliminate redundant code.

Refactor and optimize todo and user management
Updated todo API endpoints to improve parameter naming and data handling. Removed outdated files and enhanced error handling in user registration. Minor adjustments in the Todo model for better consistency.

Refactor todo and user management.
Updated todo API endpoints for better parameter naming and data handling. Removed outdated files and enhanced error handling in user registration. Simplified FastAPI app initialization by removing unused lifespan context manager.

Refactor todo management API queries.
Enhanced the `/get_todos` endpoint to accept an optional task status filter using FastAPI's `Query` parameter. Clarified the existing comments and improved the readability of API endpoints by removing redundant code.

MESSAGE.value: intitial project
API CRUD construct

Refactor app and enhance error handling
Rename `TODO_app` to `app` and replace error returns with HTTP exceptions for more proper error handling. Also, fix the bug in `create_user` by correctly assigning the user to the dictionary.

Add JWT token generation and validation
Introduces new functions `sigin` and `decode` for generating and validating JWT tokens using FastAPI and PyJWT. This update enhances authentication mechanisms by securely encoding payloads with a secret key.

Add user authentication endpoints to API
Implemented signup, signin, and auth test endpoints using FastAPI. Incorporated email registration and token-based authentication.

Add todo repository, schema, and model files
Implemented core functionality for managing To-Do items including CRUD operations in `todo_repository.py`, defined data validation schemas in `todo_schema.py`, and established a data model in `todo_model.py`. This setup provides a complete backend structure for handling To-Do items with MongoDB.

Add user repository and collection modules
Introduce `user_repository.py` and `user_collection.py` for handling user authentication and data operations. This includes password hashing, JWT token management, and MongoDB interactions for registration and authentication.

Refactor user authentication endpoints
Replaced in-memory userlist with database-backed user management. Updated signup and signin to use new async user repository methods, ensuring better separation of concerns and scalability.

Add IntelliJ configuration updates
Introduced several new configurations for project management, including AutoImportSettings and RecentsManager components. Also added Git settings, VCS Manager configuration, and coverage data management. Updated .idea/misc.xml to include a new "Black" component along with project SDK details.

Remove FastAPI user management; add MongoDB connection.
Removed the complete `main.py` and `new_main.py` that handled user management with FastAPI. Introduced a new `mongo_connection.py` to establish a MongoDB connection using motor and dotenv.

Add User model with Pydantic validation
Creates UserCreate, UserLogin, and UserResponse classes in Users/user_model.py. These classes include Pydantic validation for user attributes such as name, email, password, and token. This sets up a structured way to handle user data through type validation.

Integrate MongoDB for user management and To-Do items
Replaced FastAPI-based user management with MongoDB integration. Added user authentication functions and To-Do item operations using MongoDB collections.

Update MongoDB connection and task management
Simplified the MongoDB connection initialization by removing the default URL and enabling invalid certificate allowance. Refactored task and user management functionalities to use new data models and added token-based authentication.

Rename authentication file and add JWT-based methods
Renamed the `athentification.py` to `user_authentification.py` for better clarity. Added JWT token generation, decoding, and user registration/authentication functions leveraging FastAPI and MongoDB.

Refactor MongoDB setup and task management
Simplified MongoDB connection initialization and refactored task/user management to use new data models. Updated authentication to token-based and reorganized file structure for better readability.

Refactor MongoDB setup and task management
Updated MongoDB connection initialization and refactored task and user management to utilize new data models. Enhanced authentication to be token-based for improved security. Reorganized file structure and improved function naming for clearer readability and maintainability.

Add requirements file and minor formatting changes
Created req.txt to list project dependencies. Updated workspace.xml and formatted imports in API_connect.py for better readability. Minor whitespace adjustment in user_model.py.

Add new endpoints and models for Todos
Updated API endpoints to handle Todos CRUD operations, added new TodoModel and UpdateTODOModel classes, and updated user and todo collections for proper request handling and data storage.

Update Todos model and comments
Revised the Todos model to correct task status assignment and improved comment clarity. Adjusted examples to ensure accurate data representation in the todos model.
save project

Delete orphaned todos and user repository files
Removed outdated todo_repository.py, todo_schema.py, user_collection.py, and user_repository.py files. Updated mongo_connection.py to improve logging and error handling for MongoDB connections. Cleaned up API_connect.py to optimize user-specific todos and eliminate redundant code.

Refactor and optimize todo and user management
Updated todo API endpoints to improve parameter naming and data handling. Removed outdated files and enhanced error handling in user registration. Minor adjustments in the Todo model for better consistency.

Refactor todo and user management.
Updated todo API endpoints for better parameter naming and data handling. Removed outdated files and enhanced error handling in user registration. Simplified FastAPI app initialization by removing unused lifespan context manager.

Refactor todo management API queries.
Enhanced the `/get_todos` endpoint to accept an optional task status filter using FastAPI's `Query` parameter. Clarified the existing comments and improved the readability of API endpoints by removing redundant code.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value:
Refactor todo management API queries.
Enhanced the `/get_todos` endpoint to accept an optional task status filter using FastAPI's `Query` parameter. Clarified the existing comments and improved the readability of API endpoints by removing redundant code.
